Headline: #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cortland/Ashland
ShortDescription: SB 9 Ashland & X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Elston, North, & Ashland, due to street blockage near Cortland/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland and #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Elston, North, and Ashland, due to street blockage near Cortland/Ashland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
